name: Prep. install apk
description: Sets default download URL and public key for Modbus2Mqtt package

parameters.name: packagerpubkeyurl
parameters.description: Public key for verifying the Modbus2Mqtt package. Leaves empty to use default key

parameters.name: packageurl
parameters.description: URL of the Modbus2Mqtt package to be installed. Leaves empty to use latest release URL
